net.proteusframework.core.locale

Class TransientLocalizedObjectKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedObjectKey
      • net.proteusframework.core.locale.TransientLocalizedObjectKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class TransientLocalizedObjectKey
extends LocalizedObjectKey
    LocalizedObjectKey with localizations stored in memory. This is intended to be used with a JDBCLocaleSource.

    Useful for pairing with transient hibernate objects. Also useful for XML encoding (import-export).

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getTransientLocalizedObjectKey

        public static TransientLocalizedObjectKey getTransientLocalizedObjectKey(LocaleSource ls,
                                                         LocalizedObjectKey lok)
                                                                  throws LocaleSourceException
        Get a transient/portable localized object key with all localizations loaded from the store.
        Parameters:
        ls - the locale source.
        lok - the localized object key. The localized object key to load localizations for.
        Returns:
        the localized object key. Will be null if there are no localizations.
        Throws:
        LocaleSourceException - if there is an error accessing the locale source.

      • updateOrStore

        public LocalizedObjectKey updateOrStore(LocaleSource ls,
                               LocalizedObjectKey orig)
                                 throws LocaleSourceException
        Update or store the text in this transient LocalizedObjectKey.
        Parameters:
        ls - the locale source.
        orig - the LocalizedObjectKey to update. If null, new localizations will be inserted into the database.
        Returns:
        the LocalizedObjectKey.
        Throws:
        LocaleSourceException - if an error occurs storing or updating LocalizedObjects.
